title_localized.en: Celebrate Love and Art this Valentine’s Day at Sagamore with Place2Kiss

post_excerpt_localized.en: You are cordially invited to join Sagamore Hotel with Resident Art Advisor, Sébastien Laboureau, Bertrand Scholler, and featured artist AlexyP as we present an artsy soirée to celebrate Valentine’s Day. Join us with your special sweetheart for an evening of tapas, Champagne, music, and an unforgettable Art Talk as we toast to the most romantic night of the year.

meta_description_localized.en: You are cordially invited to join Sagamore Hotel with Resident Art Advisor, Sébastien Laboureau, Bertrand Scholler, and featured artist AlexyP as we present an artsy soirée to celebrate Valentine’s Day. Join us with your special sweetheart for an evening of tapas, Champagne, music, and an unforgettable Art Talk as we toast to the most romantic night of the year.

post_content_localized.en:
You are cordially invited to join Sagamore Hotel with Resident Art Advisor, Sébastien Laboureau, Bertrand Scholler, and featured artist AlexyP as we present an artsy soirée to celebrate Valentine’s Day. Join us with your special sweetheart for an evening of tapas, Champagne, music, and an unforgettable Art Talk as we toast to the most romantic night of the year.

Sébastien Laboureau and Bertrand Scholler lead the Art Talk with a discussion on all things ‘love’ - the love of art, the art of love, and the transformative power one has on the other, and ourselves. Like Robert Indiana’s iconic Love sculpture that has been reproduced in displays around the world, the panel will discuss other renowned works of love before an in-depth artist conversation.

Laboureau and Scholler are joined by featured artist AlexyP, who brings his ‘Place2Kiss’ concept to the Sagamore grounds. A highly regarded landscape and portrait photographer, AlexyP’s works have been published in esteemed art magazines around the world. He relocated to the Wynwood neighborhood of Miami after leaving Paris in 2005 and brought a whole lot of love to Miami’s art scene with his ‘Place2Kiss’ movement. It’s simple -  AlexyP stencils the words ‘Place2Kiss’ on sidewalks around the world. The places dedicated to love are sealed with a kiss from passers-by, because the only way to fight the bad “is to take the time to love”.

Become a part of AlexyP’s traveling cooperative movement of love by snapping a picture of you and your Valentine at one of the ‘Place2Kiss’ locations he tags around Sagamore. Have your picture taken by the artist and spread a little love of your own by uploading your shot to social media using the hashtags #Place2Kiss and #SagamoreIsArt. 

Things are heating up at Sagamore Hotel for a Valentine’s Day to remember. The amore and art event will feature a three-course tapas-style dinner, access to our pop-up lounge in the garden featuring a DJ spinning Buddha-bar style, and a complimentary glass of Champagne. Celebrate this night of love with the Sagamore on February 14th beginning at 8 p.m. Give us a call at (305) 535-8088 to reserve your tickets today. Ticket price: $65 per person.

Fall in love all over again by booking a romantic night for two at our boutique Miami Beach hotel. Our luxury rooms feature deluxe accommodations including a whirlpool tub, mini bar, on-demand movies, and Molton Brown bath products for a relaxing night in.

Choose from our best rates and special offers when you book direct with the Sagamore Hotel, an iconic Miami Beach destination known for its unique collection of contemporary art, spacious suites, and prime location only steps from the white sands of South Beach.
